data.name: Sustainable Home Loan
data.description: Our Sustainable Home Loan provides a great incentive to members for investing in environmentally friendly and sustainable features for their new home, or for adding them to their existing home. There are also all the features you'd expect, like up to 8 100% offset accounts, along with unlimited advance payments and redraws. But the real incentive is a considerable discount off our standard variable interest rate!

features.additionalInfo: No Approval, or ongoing Monthly or Annual Fees.
No monthly Access Fee on your Savings or Transaction accounts where the minimum monthly membership balance exceeds $5,000.
Take advantage of a lower purchase rate on the Your Choice Credit Card when you have this product.

constraints.additionalInfo: A minimum borrowing of $500 applies to this product.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
Borrowers must be aged 16 or older to apply. Applicants under 18 years of age, but over 16 years, may only enter into a loan contract with an adult as co-applicant or guarantor.
Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply.
Borrowers must demonstrate at least 6 months continuing employment history at the time of application.
Minimum Deposit of 20% is required (without Lenders Mortgage Insurance)
Minimum Deposit of 5% is required (with Lenders Mortgage Insurance)
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.
To be eligible for the Sustainable Home Loan your home first needs to pass the current minimum environmental standards required by your relevant state or territory authority.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments and we are required to issue a default notice to you.

fees.name: Loan Restructure Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you switch your existing Regional Australia Bank home loan to a different loan type, other than a Partnership Advantage.

fees.name: Loan Top Up Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies on approval of an additional borrowing against a property that we hold an existing mortgage over.

fees.name: Late Payment Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments by the repayment due date.

fees.name: PEXA Processing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we process a settlement relating to your loan through PEXA.

fees.name: Mortgage Documentation Preparation
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to prepare mortgage documentation relating to a property offered as security for your loan.

fees.name: Owner Builder Loan Approval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applied on approval of your Owner Builder Facility loan, prior to the initial drawdown.

fees.name: Registration of Transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to register a transfer of land relating to a property held as security for your loan.

fees.name: Discharge of Mortgage Preparation
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to prepare discharge of mortgage documentation relating  to a property held as security for your loan.

fees.name: Property Valuation Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to value each property offered or held as security at the commencement of your loan, and when required throughout the life of your loan.

fees.name: Title Search
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to perform a title search relating to a property offered, or held, as security for your loan.

fees.name: Registration of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to register a mortgage relating to a property offered as security for your loan.

fees.name: Replacement Certificate of Title
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you request a replacement certificate of title relating to mortgaged property that is held as security for your loan.

fees.name: Agency Settlement/Handing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies in the event that we require an agent to attend a settlement or handle documentation, relating to your loan.

fees.name: Registration of Discharge of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to register a discharge of mortgage relating to a property held as security for your loan.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest rate is per annum (p.a.). Variable rate for Owner Occupied Loan on Principal & Interest Repayments. The Comparison rate is calculated on a secured loan amount of $150,000 over a term of 25 years. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

Interest is per annum (p.a.). Variable rate for Owner Occupied Loan on Interest Only Repayments. The Comparison rate is calculated on a secured loan amount of $150,000 over a term of 25 years with an initial 1 year interest only period. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.
